meanings.sent1: The movie was unexciting, and I fell asleep during it.
meanings.sent2: The lecture was unexciting, but it contained important information.
meanings.sent3: The unexciting book made a great bedtime story for putting me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The unexciting party was like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The unexciting class was a real snooze-fest.

meanings.sent1: The museum exhibit was unexciting, and I quickly moved on.
meanings.sent2: The book was unexciting, so I didn't finish reading it.
meanings.sent3: The unexciting game of chess ended in a tie after hours of play.
meanings.sent4: The unexciting town had nothing to offer in terms of entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The unexciting conversation put me to sleep within minutes.
